Description: Manuscript fragment from the Mathematical Leather Roll.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: D. Austin, Poussieres d'Egypte, Boulogne-sur-Mer 1994. A mathematical text published by Glanville in JEA 13 (1927), 232-8 A. Imhausen, Mathematics in Ancient Egypt. A Contextual History (Princeton and Oxford 2016), 3, 68-69, 96-98.
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Leather: bleached, displaced fragments, fractured Black ink Backed: linen Displayed in Room 62 until 1992 Removed from display 1992 Transferred to horizontal storage 29 DEC 94 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: E Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
